availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander A. Nelson (Marshall County tavern keeper )

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, tavern keeper. Virginia native. Married to Minerva Nelson. Married to Lucinda Nelson. Tavern keeper in Marshall County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 748
Find A Grave, Alexander Nelson (1818-1886)," Memorial #29332143, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/29332143 (accessed August 28, 2019).
